[96mrgh-console(script)# help digest string[0m
Hash a provided string

Usage: string [OPTIONS] --algorithm <algorithm> <input>

Arguments:
  <input>
          String to hash

Options:
  -a, --algorithm <algorithm>
          Digest algorithm identifier (e.g., sha256). âš  Weak: MD5, SHA-1, SHA-224 (md5, sha1, sha224). See README section "Weak Digest Algorithms" for safer alternatives.

  -f, --format <format>
          Output format (json, jsonl, csv, hex, base64, hashcat, multihash=base58btc)
          
          [default: hex]
          [possible values: json, json-lines, csv, hex, base64, hashcat, multihash]

      --hash-only
          Emit only digests without original input

  -h, --help
          Print help

  -V, --version
          Print version

[96mrgh-console(script)# digest string --algorithm blake3 "alpha"[0m
644a9bc57c6063e2ba4028fa73ed585170ae7db8ac7723d32be49c021a0225f5 alpha
